summary:
This mod adds \"Tolfdir Sensei\" near the river in Riverwood. 
He comes by invited the smell of carrots.

\"Sensei\" means a teacher.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds \"Tolfdir Sensei\" near the river in Riverwood. 
He comes by invited the smell of carrots.

\"Sensei\" means a teacher.

Installation:
-------------
Place the esp file into your data folder.

Compatibilty:
-------------
This mod contains NO scripts.?2kb.

Recommned?Mod:
-------------
UFO

-If you like this, please use it!-
author: SunoharaHermione
